pkgmetadata.longdescription: Climate Downscaling Library for Daily Climate Model Output // A suite of routines for downscaling coarse scale global climate model (GCM) output to a fine spatial resolution. Includes Bias- Corrected Spatial Downscaling (BCDS), Constructed Analogues (CA), Climate Imprint (CI), and Bias Correction/Constructed Analogues with Quantile mapping reordering (BCCAQ). Developed by the the Pacific Climate Impacts Consortium (PCIC), Victoria, British Columbia, Canada.
